==============================
Dephan ROS driver installation
==============================


Supported platfrorms
--------------------

Driver was tested under the ``Ubuntu 20.04``.


Requirements
------------
* ``cmake`` for building project (version 3.16 or higher)
* ``fmt`` for C++ string formatting
* ``nlohmann_json`` for reading .yaml configuration files

You can install it via commands:

.. tabs::
    
    .. code-tab:: console Ubuntu

        sudo apt install cmake libfmt-dev nlohmann-json3-dev
